gameDetails.name: Die Glasstra√üe: Oktoberfest
gameDetails.description:
Die Glasstraße: Oktoberfest is a small expansion that allows its owner to immediately remove any number of landscape tiles (i.e., Pits, Groves and Ponds) from their board that are adjacent to this building. Gain 4 water per removed Pond. Gain 4 Quartz sand per removed Pit. Gain 4 wood per removed Grove. Rotate the Production wheels after every removal if necessary.

This expansion, originally available as a promotional item at SPIEL '14, appears in the Glass Road base game starting with the 2021 editions.
